channel.title: PLAXIS LE News Feed
channel.description: Informing on the latest PLAXIS LE News

item.title: Adopting GeoStudio for PLAXIS LE users: A Resource Guide
item.description: Everything you need to know on how to easily upgrade from PLAXIS LE to GeoStudio

item.title: How to export your soil database from SoilVision Soils in PLAXIS LE
item.description: Learn in this short video the two ways of exporting your soil database from SoilVision Soils when using PLAXIS LE: per material and for your entire database.

item.title: The final update of PLAXIS LE and PLAXIS Designer: 21.08
item.description: We are pleased to announce the final PLAXIS LE release: PLAXIS LE 21.08

item.title: PLAXIS LE Product Support and Retirement
item.description: Following the PLAXIS LE and PLAXIS Designer retirement announcement in June 2023 this page provides information for migration and FAQs
